text: “(Mûsa) adati: “ Choka, ndithu pa iwe (pali chilango) pa moyo (wako) choti uzingonena (kuti): “Musandikhudze musandikhudze.” (Ndipo palibe amene adzakuyandikira ndipo iwe sudzayandikira aliyense). Ndithu pa iwe pali lonjezo la (Allah) losaswedwa; ndipo muyang’ane mulungu wako, yemwe wakhala ukupitiriza kumpembedza. Timtentha, kenako chipala chakecho tichimwaza m’nyanja
